name: comment-block-parser
description: Block parser for markdown-magic - Parse comment blocks in markdown and other files
author: David Wells

scripts.publish: pnpm publish && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm run build && pnpm version major && pnpm publish && git push origin && git push origin --tags
